actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: Providing for enclosing the galleries of the House of Representatives with a transparent and substantial material.

summary.text: Requires the Architect of the Capitol to: (1) enclose the galleries of the House of Representatives with a transparent and substantial material; and (2) install equipment so that the House floor proceedings will be clearly audible in them. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Providing for enclosing the galleries of the House of Representatives with a transparent and substantial material.
